title: My Artist Is Reborn - Novel Updates
genre: Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Ghosts   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Management   Manly Gay Couple   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Music   Overpowered Protagonist   Persistent Love Interests   Romantic Subplot   Second Chance   Sharp-tongued Characters   Showbiz   Singers   Slow Romance   Wealthy Characters
author: 薄荷貓
description:
Shen Huai was abandoned by all his artists and took over the one no one was optimistic about, the unpopular newcomer Ye Cang.

Ye Cang caught fire all over the country. Everyone thought it was due to Shen Huai’s influence. Only Shen Huai knew that his artist was a reborn rockstar. 

Later, Shen Huai also signed the reborn “Legendary Film Queen,” the unsurpassed “Golden Supporting Role,” the “Queen of All Love Songs,” and the “Greatest Superstar in the Past Hundred Years.” Thus, he breathed a sigh of relief; he didn’t have to return to inherit billions of dollars.>
